result.eng: The money was gone by the end of the month.
result.ga: Bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosa
result.orig: Bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosa
result.html: Bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosaThe money was gone by the end of the month.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an t-airgead ídiṫe faoi ḋeireaḋ na míosaThe money was gone by the end of the month.

result.eng: I had to pay the money.
result.ga: Bhí orm an t-airgead a íoc
result.orig: Bhí orm an t-airgead a íoc
result.html: Bhí orm an t-airgead a íocI had to pay the money.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orm an t-airgead a íocI had to pay the money.

result.eng: How much money does he have?
result.ga: Cá mhéad airgid atá aige
result.orig: Cá mhéad airgid atá aige
result.html: Cá mhéad airgid atá aigeHow much money does he have?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad airgid atá aigeHow much money does he have?

result.eng: The money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ga: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.orig: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.html: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ponchtml: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfaḋ sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.

result.eng: I put all the money on the horse.
result.ga: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.orig: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.html: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapallI put all the money on the horse.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an ċapallI put all the money on the horse.

result.eng: This is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ga: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.orig: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.html: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ponchtml: Seo an duine ar tugaḋ an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.

result.eng: You will have to repay the money.
result.ga: Beidh ort an t-airgead a aisíoc
result.orig: Beidh ort an t-airgead a aisíoc
result.html: Beidh ort an t-airgead a aisíocYou will have to repay the money.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort an t-airgead a aisíocYou will have to repay the money.

result.eng: We will be needing more money in the future.
result.ga: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseo
result.orig: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseo
result.html: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseoWe will be needing more money in the future.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tuilleaḋ airgid ag teastáil uainn amaċ anseoWe will be needing more money in the future.

result.eng: My money was leaving me fast.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.html: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid airgid ag imeaċt uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.

result.eng: You spend too much money on drink.
result.ga: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.orig: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.html: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deochYou spend too much money on drink.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫeann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoċYou spend too much money on drink.

result.eng: I lost all the money.
result.ga: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.orig: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.html: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.

result.eng: Some of the money is still left.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágthaSome of the money is still left.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágṫaSome of the money is still left.

result.eng: How much money do you want?
result.ga: Cá mhéad airgid atá uait
result.orig: Cá mhéad airgid atá uait
result.html: Cá mhéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.orig: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.html: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ponchtml: Cé a d'íocfaḋ airgead ar éadaí a ḃí déanta ċoṁ dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.eng: He tells me he has no money.
result.ga: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.orig: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.html: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.
result.ponchtml: Deir sé liom naċ ḃfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.

result.eng: Twice as much money.
result.ga: Dhá oiread an airgid
result.orig: Dhá oiread an airgid
result.html: Dhá oiread an airgidTwice as much money.
result.ponchtml: Ḋá oiread an airgidTwice as much money.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: If I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ga: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.orig: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.html: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ponchtml: Dá mbeaḋ airgead agam ċeannóinn teaċ mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.

result.eng: No matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ga: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.orig: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.html: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.

result.eng: I see a big pile of money in my visions.
result.ga: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingí
result.orig: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingí
result.html: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingíI see a big pile of money in my visions.
result.ponchtml: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo ċuid aislingíI see a big pile of money in my visions.

result.eng: A sum of money was found.
result.ga: Fuarthas suim airgid
result.orig: Fuarthas suim airgid
result.html: Fuarthas suim airgidA sum of money was found.
result.ponchtml: Fuarṫas suim airgidA sum of money was found.

result.eng: He is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ga: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.orig: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.html: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ponchtml: Is státseirḃíseaċ é - i ḃfocail eile tá sé ag maireaċtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.

result.eng: She got no money from me.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.orig: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.html: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.

result.eng: I only have a little money.
result.ga: Níl ach beagán airgid agam
result.orig: Níl ach beagán airgid agam
result.html: Níl ach beagán airgid agamI only have a little money.
result.ponchtml: Níl aċ beagán airgid agamI only have a little money.

result.eng: I have no money.
result.ga: Níl aon airgead agam
result.orig: Níl aon airgead agam
result.html: Níl aon airgead agamI have no money.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon airgead agamI have no money.

result.eng: We don't have enough money - exactly!
result.ga: Níl dóthain airgid againn - Go díreach
result.orig: Níl dóthain airgid againn - Go díreach
result.html: Níl dóthain airgid againn - Go díreachWe don't have enough money - exactly!
result.ponchtml: Níl dóṫain airgid againn - Go díreaċWe don't have enough money - exactly!

result.eng: He shares his money generously.
result.ga: Roinneann sé a chuid airgid go fial
result.orig: Roinneann sé a chuid airgid go fial
result.html: Roinneann sé a chuid airgid go fialHe shares his money generously.
result.ponchtml: Roinneann sé a ċuid airgid go fialHe shares his money generously.

result.eng: Here is your money back.
result.ga: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.orig: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.html: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.
result.ponchtml: Seo duit do ċuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.

result.eng: He has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ga: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.orig: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.html: Tá a lán airgid aige sa bhancHe has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ponchtml: Tá a lán airgid aige sa ḃancHe has a lot of money in the bank.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ga: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.orig: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.html: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ponchtml: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrṫa gaċ bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: I have spent some of the money.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.

result.eng: I hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.orig: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.html: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam nár ġoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.html: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ponchtml: Le linn na fostaíoċta seo níor íocaḋ aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: Ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.ga: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.orig: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.html: Thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: Plates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ga: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ponchtml: Plátaí airgid a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
